description: Try our easy to follow Bubba's Tortilla recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baby food,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,Microwave,Soy free,Wheat free,Mince,Peanut free
name: Bubba's Tortilla Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Boil, steam or microwave potatoes until just tender, drain.
Heat oil in a medium frying pan; cook for 1-2 minutes or until softened but not brown.
Add mince, cook, stirring until brown. Remove from pan; drain on absorbent paper.
Whisk eggs in a large bowl with milk, shallots and cheese. Stir in potato and mince mixture.
Pour mixture into a heated oiled small non-stick frying pan. Cook, covered, over low heat about 5-8 minutes or until tortilla is just set.
Carefully invert tortilla onto a plate, slide back into pan; cook, uncovered, about 3-5 minutes or until cooked through.
Place in a blender; purée to desired consistency for baby’s developmental age. Add a little extra milk if required. Makes 8 baby portions
